projects.title: Movie Database
projects.description: A movie database project is a software application or website that allows users to browse and search for information about movies. It typically includes a database of movies with details such as titles, release dates, genres, cast and crew, ratings, and plot summaries. Users can interact with the database by searching for specific movies, exploring popular or trending films, reading reviews and ratings, and saving movies to a favourite's list. This project utilizes The Movie Database API to access all the information about movies.

projects.title: Project 3
projects.description: For this project, I collaborated with a team to build a database-driven web application using Django framework. It allowed users to create and manage their personal tasks.
